mapper.select: select employee_id,emp_name,salary,manager_id from employees order by emp_name

select a.employee_id,a.emp_name,a.salary,b.emp_name manager_name, to_char(a.hire_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') hire_date,a.email from employees a, employees b where a.employee_id=#{param1} and a.manager_id=b.employee_id(+)
select count(*) cnt from employees where manager_id=#{param1}
